title: Running the Curve
caption: orchestral trance, symphonic strings, powerful brass, trance arpeggios, cinematic EDM, epic anthem
lyrics:
[INTRO]
I can feel it pulling
before I see it

[VERSE 1]
I’ve been running on a curve of light
like the ground might fall away
Every step gets louder
the closer I get to the edge

I didn’t come for answers
I just needed room to breathe
The sky keeps opening
like it’s daring me

[PRE-CHORUS]
My heart keeps counting seconds
that my mouth won’t say

[CHORUS]
I’m racing to the edge of the planet
not to jump, just to know
If I stop at the line or keep going
when there’s nowhere left to go

I want to feel the ground give up
before I do

[VERSE 2]
I’ve been carrying this gravity
like it knows my name
Every memory gets heavier
the faster I move away

I look back once
then I don’t
because I know what I’ll see

[BREAK]
Wind in my chest
Hands shaking
Still moving

[FINAL CHORUS]
I’m racing to the edge of the planet
with everything I couldn’t say
If I disappear over the horizon
at least I chose the way

I don’t need to be saved
I just need to arrive

[OUTRO]
The edge is closer now
I don’t slow down
